video.title: Archer
video.synopsis: Suave, sophisticated spy Archer may have the coolest gadgets, but he still has issues when it comes to dealing with his boss, who is also his mother.

episodes.synopsis: While his fellow agents search for a mole in their ranks, Archer hacks into the agency's computers to conceal discrepancies in his expense accounts.
episodes.title: Pilot: Mole Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Sensing that Lana still has the hots for Archer, Malory makes accountant Cyril the agency's newest field agent.
episodes.title: Training Day

episodes.synopsis: The agency hires a studly agent because of his minority status, and the man makes an impressive debut -- but Archer suspects he has ulterior motives.
episodes.title: Diversity Hire

episodes.synopsis: Malory holds a shindig to schmooze with United Nations bigwig Torvald Utne, just as a group of assassins closes in to kill him.
episodes.title: Killing Utne

episodes.synopsis: In a bid to get back a compromising videotape from a blackmailer, Malory tasks Archer with seducing the culprit, a gay Cuban secret agent.
episodes.title: Honeypot

episodes.synopsis: Lana travels to a tropical paradise to eliminate an arms dealer, but she gets taken hostage instead. Meanwhile, Malory hooks up with her KGB lover.
episodes.title: Skorpio

episodes.synopsis: A devious plot comes to light when Archer and his fellow agents are called in to find a bomb that threatens to blow up a luxury air ship.
episodes.title: Skytanic

episodes.synopsis: When ODIN shows up the agency yet again, Archer and Lana plot to get their revenge by stealing a priceless diamond belonging to ODIN's best client.
episodes.title: The Rock

episodes.synopsis: When Archer jumps ship and joins ODIN, Malory tries to get him back. Meanwhile, Lana tries to nab the job at ODIN for herself.
episodes.title: Job Offer

episodes.synopsis: Archer gets into a ferocious fight with Malory over the identity of his father, and Lana decides to get even with Cyril.
episodes.title: Dial M for Mother

episodes.synopsis: Sent to a Swiss resort town to protect the daughter of a billionaire, Archer quickly discovers that the girl will do anything to seduce him.
episodes.title: Swiss Miss

episodes.synopsis: Archer and his fellow agents spring into action to prevent Malory, who lost all her money in a Ponzi scheme, from selling the agency to ODIN.
episodes.title: A Going Concern

episodes.synopsis: When his favorite hooker claims that he's the father of her baby boy, Archer goes to extremes to manipulate the results of a paternity test.
episodes.title: Blood Test

episodes.synopsis: The agency sends Archer and Lana into the swamplands of Louisiana to protect a natural gas pipeline from an eco-terrorist bent on destroying it.
episodes.title: Pipeline Fever

episodes.synopsis: When Woodhouse's old military chums start turning up dead, Archer sets out to protect his valet and find the killer, all while caring for baby Seamus.
episodes.title: The Double Deuce

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to overcome his reputation as a loser, Cyril secretly deploys a virus into the agency's computers so that he can then heroically defeat it.
episodes.title: Tragical History

episodes.synopsis: When a movie star spends time with the agents to research a role, her star power exacerbates the dysfunctional relationships that plague the agency.
episodes.title: Movie Star

episodes.synopsis: When he discovers that he has to undergo surgery for breast cancer, Archer tries to make amends with Lana and his other colleagues at the agency.
episodes.title: Stage Two

episodes.synopsis: Enraged when he discovers that the cancer drugs he's been taking are phony, Archer goes on a violent spree against the crooks responsible.
episodes.title: Placebo Effect

episodes.synopsis: When kidnappers mistake Pam for Cheryl/Carol, the agency goes into lockdown and the gang learns something surprising about Cheryl/Carol.
episodes.title: El Secuestro

episodes.synopsis: When the agents travel to Monaco to pay off a blackmailer, Archer blows the money on gambling and everyone scrambles to get it back.
episodes.title: Jeu Monégasque

episodes.synopsis: Once again searching for his father, Archer journeys to Russia where the KGB captures him. Desperate, Malory sends ODIN's Barry Dillon to the rescue.
episodes.title: White Nights

episodes.synopsis: Returning from his adventure in Russia, Archer brings back with him Katya Kazanova, a defecting KGB spy. But is she a double agent?
episodes.title: Double Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Archer, in hiding since the murder of his fiancée, is finally tracked down in the South Pacific by handsome adventurer Rip Riley.
episodes.title: Heart of Archness, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Archer deals with the trials and tribulations of being Pirate King while the agency remains semi-committed to his rescue.
episodes.title: Heart of Archness, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Archer and the other captives finally manage to escape the Pirate Fortress, but they pay a heavy price.
episodes.title: Heart of Archness, Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Archer is shocked to learn that his mother is dating his idol, Burt Reynolds.
episodes.title: The Man from Jupiter

episodes.synopsis: Malory promotes Cyril to field agent and also institutes a strict drug-testing policy, neither of which sits well with the agency staff.
episodes.title: El Contador

episodes.synopsis: A cunning Canadian terrorist escapes custody while being transported by the agency aboard a train back to his native land.
episodes.title: The Limited

episodes.synopsis: When dangerous crooks steal his new supercharged spy car, Archer must get it back before Malory finds out it's missing.
episodes.title: Drift Problem

episodes.synopsis: Malory calls on Archer and Lana to bail her out of a jam when a prominent Italian politician turns up dead in her apartment.
episodes.title: Lo Scandalo

episodes.synopsis: When Ray's brother runs afoul of a corrupt rural sheriff, Archer and the gang sneak away from the agency to help bail him out.
episodes.title: Bloody Ferlin

episodes.synopsis: When KGB agent Nikolai Jakov gets shipped to Siberia, he decides to defect to the agency. Meanwhile, Archer's partying ways catch up to him.
episodes.title: Crossing Over

episodes.synopsis: Archer gets a shock in Krieger's lab when he discovers that his dead fiancée, Katya, isn't exactly dead.
episodes.title: Skin Game

episodes.synopsis: Archer and his fellow agents try to head off a disastrous mutiny aboard the orbiting space station Horizon.
episodes.title: Space Race, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Mutineers aboard the space station Horizon take Archer and his fellow agents captive and plan to send them to Mars.
episodes.title: Space Race, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Archer has amnesia and decides the only cure is a spa weekend.
episodes.title: Fugue and Riffs

episodes.synopsis: Archer and his former best friend (guest star Timothy Olyphant) are holed up in the Vermont wilderness, fighting hard to come out on top.
episodes.title: The Wind Cries Mary

episodes.synopsis: Archer's fear of cyborgs hits home when Krieger offers to make robotic legs for Gillette.
episodes.title: Legs

episodes.synopsis: The beginning of beautiful hatred between Archer and his new stepfather plays out as the two are chased by gangsters.
episodes.title: Midnight Ron

episodes.synopsis: Archer's former fiancée wants him to save her cyborg boyfriend, who is trapped in outer space. Archer wants ... other things.
episodes.title: Viscous Coupling

episodes.synopsis: Things get pretty weird after a cobra bites Archer in a special place.
episodes.title: Once Bitten

episodes.synopsis: Archer, Lana, and Cyril go undercover in celebrity chef Lance Casteau's hellish kitchen. Anthony Bourdain guest stars.
episodes.title: Live and Let Dine

episodes.synopsis: Archer heads to the Mexican border to capture a notorious coyote -- which is Spanish for coyote.
episodes.title: Coyote Lovely

episodes.synopsis: Archer and Lana pose as newlyweds to stop a sale of enriched uranium. Spoiler alert: Lana goes nuclear before the bomb does.
episodes.title: The Honeymooners

episodes.synopsis: Archer and Lana extract an agent from Morocco, only to find out his bark is worse than his bite.
episodes.title: Un Chien Tangerine

episodes.synopsis: Archer must rescue the Pope from an assassination plot using Woodhouse as a decoy.  Operation Bad Habit is a go.
episodes.title: The Papal Chase

episodes.synopsis: Cheryl's brother Cecil and his girlfriend drive her crazier than usual as they travel into the Bermuda Triangle, where mysteries abound!
episodes.title: Sea Tunt: Part I

episodes.synopsis: Archer and his fellow agents go to an underwater laboratory to stop the deranged Captain Murphy.
episodes.title: Sea Tunt: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Someone dies -- someone who's been with the agency crew from the beginning. And then things get crazy.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: White Elephant

episodes.synopsis: Archer, Pam and Lana travel to Miami to visit old friends. It's a fondue party!
episodes.title: Archer Vice: A Kiss While Dying

episodes.synopsis: Pam makes a deal that puts everyone in danger. Archer dons his slightly darker black suit to save the day.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: A Debt of Honor

episodes.synopsis: Archer has to stage an intervention for Pam, but it gets derailed by an unwanted guest.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: House Call

episodes.synopsis: To get Cherlene to a concert in Texas, Malory buys a bus and takes everyone on a road trip. Put that hammer down and give it hell.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Southbound and Down

episodes.synopsis: Archer travels to Colombia on a secret mission that becomes less than secret after he gets drunk.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Smugglers' Blues

episodes.synopsis: Archer, Ray and Cyril raft through crocodile-infested waters, while Lana and Pam plan a spa day for Malory.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: The Rules of Extraction

episodes.synopsis: Archer avoids crash-landing in a dangerous swamp, only to come face to face with a shady arms dealer.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: On The Carpet

episodes.synopsis: Archer decides to give Lana the perfect baby shower gift by forcing Kenny Loggins to sing a duet with Cherlene. Something something Danja Zown!
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Baby Shower

episodes.synopsis: Archer and the gang are guests of Gustavo Calderon and his wife, Juliana. Calderon is a big fan of Cherlene, but Juliana is a bigger fan of Archer.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Palace Intrigue: Part I

episodes.synopsis: Archer tries to keep his fling with the dictator's wife a secret, while Krieger bonds with his clone brothers.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Palace Intrigue: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Cyril becomes the new president of San Marcos, Cherlene becomes the first lady of country music, and Archer becomes a resistance fighter.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Filibuster

episodes.synopsis: Archer helps Lana with the delivery of her baby, while Krieger tries to prevent the delivery of a deadly weapon.
episodes.title: Archer Vice: Arrival / Departure
